steps.250: Add-Add 1/8 cup soy sauce to the bowl
steps.252: Add-Add 1 tablespoon honey to the bowl
steps.253: cook-cook, stirring often, for 4 minutes. If the pan gets too hot on medium-high, turn the heat down to medium
steps.254: Add-Add 1 teaspoon cornstarch to the bowl
steps.255: Add-Add 2 cloves minced garlic to the bowl
steps.256: Pour-Pour the sauce into the skillet
steps.258: Add-add sliced mushrooms to the skillet
steps.261: Add-Add bell pepper to the skillet
steps.264: cook-cook, stirring, for 1 minute until the sauce thickens
steps.266: Heat-Heat 2 tablespoons olive oil in a skillet over medium-high heat
steps.267: Add-Add 1/2 tablespoon minced ginger to the bowl
steps.268: Add-Add 1/8 teaspoon black pepper to the bowl
steps.272: Whisk-Whisk the sauce again to recombine the ingredients
steps.274: continue cooking-continue cooking, stirring often, for 2-3 minutes, until vegetables are crisp-tender
